p: Reviewer #1: In this study, authors aimed to verify how the Zika epidemic has molded scientific production worldwide analyzing international collaboration and the knowledge landscape through time, research topics and country involvement. Mapping the response to Zika, a public health emergency, demonstrated a clear pattern of the participation of countries in the scientific advances.
